data.name: Tank Battle Heroes: Esports War
data.detailed_description:
Buzz

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419980/INTERASTRA/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402650/Birding_Simulator/


About the Game



Choose your tank, upgrade your deadly weapon and get ready for REAL WAR in an exciting arena where there's danger around every corner! Destroy enemies, aim precisely, shoot fast and dominate the world full of different tanks!

FEATURES:

  • üß†Choose the best strategy and make the right decisions!
  • üëªFeel the spirit of real tank battlefields!
  • üîêUnlock and upgrade your war machines!
  • üí£Choose between various war machines categories from WW2 classics to modern ones!
  • üõ°Ô∏èDefend your country or break frontlines with no mercy!
  • ‚öîÔ∏èConquer every battlefield and fight against players from all over the world!
  • üèÜBecome a hero driving your tank through European battlefields!

3 UNIQUE TANK BATTLEFIELDS!

Defeat the enemy on the ice, desert, and deep in the forest. Every map requires a different pack of skills - we count on you!

DIFFERENT IRON WARFARE SETTINGS!

Make your way to the victory in every available tank and unlock all the options to customize your war machine's weapon!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!

Time to see in action the most powerful tanks, the modern battlefield! Hey Soldier, keep an eye on every detail of your weapon and enemy's armor! Don't forget to watch your back - rivals are waiting for your mistake!

data.short_description: Join an epic war on the battlefield! Lead your tank to victory. Tank Battle Heroes is a game that allows you to play single-player and multiplayer PVP. Take on enemy forces, upgrade your machine and stand on the top in the ranking!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.9ghz Intel i5-equivalent processor or higher
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or better, Radeon HD 2000 or better, Intel HD 4000 / IvyBridge or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8 or greater
  • Processor: 1.9ghz processor or higher
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
